titles.title: Federal Employee Tax Accountability Act of 2011
To amend title 5, United States Code, to provide that persons having seriously delinquent tax debts shall be ineligible for Federal employment.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: 2/28/2011--Introduced. Federal Employee Tax Accountability Act of 2011 - Makes an individual who has a seriously delinquent tax debt ineligible to be appointed, or to continue serving, as a federal employee.
